title: Help me! My games are being frozen!!
body: Guys help me plz!! Just 2 days I go I was playing League and it worked good and yesterday I logged on to play and as soon I got into the game (rift) my computer froze and started to make a buzzz noise... I have to restart it every time. Help me plz. Patch 6.19

replies.body:
I have left similar board message.  

Lenovo Z70, new 2016.  Middle to game, buzz or click and entire screen freezes.  NO alternative but to reboot.  NEVER happened prior to say mid to third week in September.  Is not hard drive as I had hard drive replaced and this still occurs.

Any assist would be appreciated.  

Has happened numerous times and only when making active keystrokes or mouse clicks.  never when game is just 'idle' and never at beginning of game or logon

Thanks

It sounds like you're encountering the issue with the Windows game bar inside of Windows 10. A recent update enabled a feature called *Game DVR* which is causing system freezes for some players. I strongly recommend [disabling the Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) as a first step to see if it resolves the issue.

Let me know if this did resolve the problem.

Are you a Windows 10 user who got a recent W10 Anniversary update? Please have a look at these threads:
